avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted in warm weather the last few days. It should stiffen and gain even more strength when temperatures drop below 0°C.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It warmed up significantly in all elevations on Sunday and has been warm since. Snow has subsided and melted. Snow has decreased in mountains and is now presumably homogeneous and stable. The avalanche danger is considered low. Snow should stiffen and gain even more strength when temperatures drop below 0°C.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted during thaw this week. Little snow is left in the area and little avalanche danger.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Significant warming up to mountain tops and subsequent warming in the last week has caused the snow to subside and melt. Little snow is left in the area, except in gullies and is expected to be homogeneous. During cooling over the weekend, snow will get stiffer and strengthen again.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Kólnandi veður yfir helgina og úrkomulítið en lítilsháttar éljagangur í NA 8-12 m/s á laugardag til fjalla. Á mánudag má gera ráð fyrir að snjói í hægum vindi.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather this past week and is generally considered stable. Wind slabs may have formed in upper elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather this past week and is generally considered stable. Wind slabs may have formed in the area in upper elevations. Thaw has likely impacted snow less in upper elevations with potential weak layers still present in the snow pack underneath crust and wind drift.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Kólnandi veður yfir helgina, NA-átt og lítilsháttar éljagangur. Annars úrkomulítið, kalt og hægur vindur. Á þriðjudag má gera ráð fyrir að snjói á svæðinu í N-átt.

avalancheActivity.comment: Slab avalanches released in Lambeyrardalur above Eskifjörður and Bagall in of Norðfjörður on Monday, January 8th. The same day, multiple rather small loose avalanches released in the area.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather and partly melted away. It should widely have become stiff and rather stable. High in mountains, weaknesses can still exist and grow with cooling temperatures. Snow will be added in mountains in a strong NW wind on Tueasday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It got warm up to mountain tops on Sunday and Monday and then, snow subsided and partly melted. Multiple avalanches released during this temperature change. After this thaw, snow should widely have become stiff and rather stable. In the highest mountains, where the effect of the thaw has been less, there is more snow and a possibility for a deeper weakness. At these high elevations, avalanches can become large if they release. Weaknesses can grow with in the snowpack with cooling temperatures. Snow will be added in mountains in a strong NW wind on Tueasday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has settled and melted significantly in repeated melt-freeze cycles last week. The stability is considered good most places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Talsverð frost næstu daga og lítilsháttar él. Bætir í úrkomu seinnipart mánudags. Allhvöss eða hvöss NV átt  með snjókomu á þriðjudag.
